name: In The Blue Hour of Twilight
name_original: In The Blue Hour of Twilight
description:
This is my final bachelor project for the Royal Danish Academy.

It was made in close cooperation with Albert Christoffersen, my very talented friend.

A lonely tower, surrounded by trees. A solitary munk, trying to get closer to his god.

Play as a munk trying to get closer to god through isolation.

The project is originally in danish, but I have done my best to translate the subtitles and menus. Please keep in mind it was made for another language, but I believe it should translate nicely through gameplay.

Controls

The game is controlled using only the left and right mouse buttons. Use either the mouse or spacebar to interact, depending on the situation.
Move around using WASD

Requirements

The game is very unoptimized and requires a powerful graphics card. Please keep this in mind. If you are unable to run the game, you can watch the full playthrough on youtube.
